item.title: [317] ~Rune-Immune v4~ ~Progress~ ~MiniGames~ ~Skillcape Emotes~ [317]
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

[quote="~google~, post:5, topic:305315"][quote author=Da 0wnz link=topic=401559.msg2976317#msg2976317 date=1254308651]

Awkward npc for the barrows mini. Just my opinion though, I’d rather make it more themed on a barrows character-- the grave watcher on the hills.

Yeah that was just a base for it that I got from Jad. I’ll edit it to make it maybe Dharok talking or something?

b.c u said #1 317 ima cut u up into little pieces xD sarcasm

uhm, gl i guess, atho, how the hell is it v4?

first post first time > ur second post hoes

I released v3 to downloads section like 2 weeks ago, and I had v1 an 2 released prolly back in december of 08 lol, I stopped making em after I released 2 then came back to them about a month or two ago.

[/quote]

why dharok? his a monster in there if you killed him why would he be giving you the reward?[/quote]

Good point… Got any ideas?

Read full topic
